heading: Tomb of the Saints Dungeon Guide
content: Avoid Tomb of the Saints for any reason other than unlocking its Renown and Aspect, the Sorceror's . It's almost completely full of , includes a "Slay all" objective, and has you backtrack through two opposite sides of the second zone to activate the Release Switches. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
